metadata.name: Sanbase Subscription #1
metadata.description:
Introducing the Sanbase Subscription, an exclusive collection of NFTs that offer limited time access to our flagship platform, Sanbase (app.santiment.net). As a holder of one of these rare NFTs, you will be granted access* to our cutting-edge crypto analytics tools and receive lifetime discounts on our services.

Each NFT in this collection is a unique and one-of-a-kind piece of digital art, created by our talented team of designers. Not only are they visually stunning, but they also hold real value as a gateway to our powerful crypto analytical tools and community generated insights.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to own a piece of the Santiment collection and become a part of the community. Act fast and secure your NFT today!

https://santiment.net/ -  more info about Santiment

https://app.santiment.net/ - Sanbase (crypto analytics platform)

*Please note that access to Sanbase PRO is only available during the limited time period specified on the NFT. Lifetime discounts apply as long as the NFT is held.
